author: sdeboy
msg: using filter.setnext instead of holding a collection of filters.
At some time soon this will be changed to use addNestedFilter

author: ceki
msg: - Fixed a bug in ConsoleAppender preventing it from displaying any output.

author: ceki
msg: - log4j.jar now confoms to the UGLI model.
The problem discovered by Scott is still not fixed.

author: sdeboy
msg: AndFilter now supports any number of contained filters, using Joran's support for collections.

author: sdeboy
msg: Relying on Joran implicit actions to provide a filter that ANDs two nested filters.
If both filters return accept, acceptOnMatch is used to return either ACCEPT or DENY
